headerDisplay: To use this plugin, you need to first authenticate using the included script.  Open a terminal and navigate to node_modules/homebridge-cync.  Run 'npm run cync-auth <Cync email address>'.  This will send you a two-factor code.  Once you receive that, run 'npm run cync-auth <Cync email address> <Cync password> <two-factor code>.  Save the refresh token, user ID and authorize token to the settings.
